channel.title: How do i a code that tells me what coords im standing on?
channel.description:
I need a code that tells me what coords im standing on, or even better if you can help me by msn you can be moderator on my server and maybe admin :) My msn is
Evolution_team-fantasy@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: How do i a code that tells me what coords im standing on?
item.dc:creator: @johnj98 johnj98
item.description:
@johnj98 wrote:

Ii 1337 iI You think your so smart i forgot there’s other sources(compiled one’s)
That don’t have coordson

Read full topic
item.source: How do i a code that tells me what coords im standing on?

item.title: How do i a code that tells me what coords im standing on?
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

::coordson is clientside not server side. If you really don’t figure that out by even downloading moparscape’s client… then wow.

[quote=“johnj98, post:4, topic:221452”]OK openice123 why would you need to add a command
Just use coordson on.
Unless the command doesn’t exist.
PS
I am trying not to be a asshole.[/quote][quote=“Destruction, post:5, topic:221452”]Use ::coordson. 99% of servers have this command.[/quote]

Read full topic
